duties_responsibilities.duty: Gain practical experience by working with experienced engineering and technical professionals and participating in challenging engineering projects.
Have the opportunity work with engineer mentors in the design team and take ownership of portions of various projects.
Work in coordination with other engineering disciplines and learn how a complete design package is developed.
Acquire time management, communication, and CAD drafting skills, as well as have the chance to apply engineering concepts.

education_certification.credential: Enrolled in a Mechanical Engineering program at a four-year ABET university or college with preferred targeted graduation date within 1 year (Master's preferred).
Must have a laptop with Windows operating system.
Experience with Microsoft Office programs (including Word, Excel, and Outlook).
Well organized and can effectively manage work and academic responsibilities simultaneously.
Verification of US Citizenship required upon hire.
